1751677.effect: Once per turn, if a monster effect is activated in this card's column (except during the Damage Step): You can target that monster; destroy it. During damage calculation, if your other "Glow Gods" monster battles an opponent's monster (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand or face-up field to the GY; that battling monster gains 1300 ATK during damage calculation only. You can only use this effect of "Diamond, Justice of the Glow Gods" once per turn.
1751677.name: Diamond, Justice of the Glow Gods
1751677.treated_as: Diamond, Justice of the Glow Gods

1751633.effect: Once per turn, if a Spell/Trap Card is activated in this card's column: You can Special Summon 1 "Glow Gods" monster from your GY. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Glow God" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Garnet, Tower of the Glow Gods" once per turn.
1751633.name: Garnet, Tower of the Glow Gods
1751633.treated_as: Garnet, Tower of the Glow Gods

1751651.effect: Once per turn, if a monster effect is activated in this card's column (except during the Damage Step): You can draw 1 card. If a monster you control is destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when that monster was destroyed) or hand (even if not), but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Jade, Majesty of the Glow Gods" once per turn.
1751651.name: Jade, Majesty of the Glow Gods
1751651.treated_as: Jade, Majesty of the Glow Gods

1751687.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Glow God" monster from your Deck to your hand. When a Spell/Trap Card is activated in this card's column (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation. You can only use each effect of "Onyx, Buster of the Glow Gods" once per turn.
1751687.name: Onyx, Buster of the Glow Gods
1751687.treated_as: Onyx, Buster of the Glow Gods

1751639.effect: If you control a "Glow God" monster, except "Verastes, Glory of the Glow Gods": You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If a Spell/Trap Card is activated in this card's column (except during the Damage Step): You can add 1 "Glow Gods" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Ruby, Glory of the Glow Gods" once per turn.
1751639.name: Ruby, Glory of the Glow Gods
1751639.treated_as: Ruby, Glory of the Glow Gods

1751664.effect: During the Main Phase, if you control a Glow Gods monster and have not Special Summoned a monster this turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand and if you do, you can negate the effects of all face-up cards in this cards column until the End Phase. If an opponents monster effect is activated in activated is this cards column (except during the Damage Step): You can target that monster; return it to the hand. You can only use each effect of Sapphire, Queen of the Glow Gods once per turn.
1751664.name: Sapphire, Queen of the Glow Gods
1751664.treated_as: Sapphire, Queen of the Glow Gods

1752223.effect: Choose 1 of your opponent's unoccupied Spell/Trap Zones; if your opponent would activate a Spell/Trap in that Spell/Trap Zone, and the chosen zone can be used, they must use that zone. This effect applies until the chosen zone is occupied or becomes unusable. You can only activate 1 "Glow Gods Damnation" per turn.
1752223.name: Glow Gods Damnation

1888770.effect: If you control a "Galaxieve" monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then, you can discard 1 card; Special Summon a "Galaxieve" monster from your hand or GY, except the discarded card, and if you do, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck for the rest of the turn, except Xyz Monsters, then take 1000 damage. You can only use each effect of "Galaxieve Silver"once per turn.
1888770.name: Galaxieve Silver

1887355.effect: Target 1 "Galaxieve" Xyz Monster you control: Special Summon 1 "Galaxieve" Xyz Monster from your Extra Deck whose Rank is 1 or 2 higher than this card's original Rank by using a "Galaxieve" monster as material. (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon.). If the Level/Rank/Link Rating of a face-up monster on the field is changed, while this card is in your GY; you can set this card to your field, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Rank-Up-Magic Galaxieve Spark" once per turn.
1887355.name: Rank-Up-Magic Galaxieve Spark

1888810.effect: You can target 1 "Galaxieve" monster you control, reduce its Level/Rank by 1, then target 1 card on the field: Banish it. You can only use 1 "Galaxieve Wild Bolt" per turn.
1888810.name: Galaxieve Wild Bolt

1887394.effect:
3 Level 6 monsters
This card gains each of the following effects based on its Rank:
●6: (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls that has a Level/Rank/Link Rating; reduce its Level/Rank/Link Rating by 1 or 2, and if you do, increase this card's Rank by 1.
●7: You can detach 1 material from this card: Special Summon 1 "Galaxieve" monster from your hand or GY, then; you can Special Summon a Rank 5 or lower "Galaxieve" Xyz Monster, using the summoned monster as material, but it cannot attack this turn.
●8: Cannot be targeted by card effects, or destroyed by Spell effects
●9: You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 2 cards on the field: Banish them.
You can only use each effect of "Number 180: Galaxieve Shining Enforcer" once per turn.
1887394.name: Number 180: Galaxieve Shining Enforcer

1888789.effect:
3 "Galaxieve" monsters, including 2 Xyz Monsters.
Cannot be destroyed by card effects. You can target 1 "Galaxieve" Xyz Monster in your GY: Special Summon it to a zone this card points to, and if you do, if possible, increase its Rank by 1. If a "Galaxieve" monster is summoned to a zone this card points to, except by this monsters effect, you can add 1 "Galaxieve" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand. If a card on the field is destroyed by battle or card effect, you can discard 1 card, then target 1 card on the field: Destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Galaxieve Divine Warrior" once per turn.
1888789.name: Galaxieve Divine Warrior

1739784.effect: You can target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone that does not have a Pendulum Effect, except "Covert Analysis Triad Squad"; Special Summon it. You can use this effect a number of times per turn, up to the number of "Covert Analysis Triad Squad(s)" in your Monster Zone(s) when you first Summoned a "Covert Analysis Triad Squad(s)" this turn.
1739784.name: Covert Analysis Triad Squad

1739560.effect:
(This card is also always treated as a Spellcaster monster.)
You can only control 1 "The Muse, Djain". Other monsters on the field gain the following effect(s), depending on their Type(s).
●Beast: Your opponent cannot target this card for attacks unless they control a monster with at least 500 more ATK than this card.
●Spellcaster: Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects unless they control a monster with at least 500 more ATK than "The Muse, Djain."
●Other: This card loses 600 ATK/DEF.
1739560.name: The Muse, Djain

1742068.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Creation Manifesto". If this card is Ritual Summoned: You can destroy any number of cards your opponent controls, also, for the rest of the Duel after this effect resolves, negate the first X effects you activate each turn (even if this card leaves the field). (X = the number of cards destroyed by this effect.) You can only use this effect of "Araphel" once per Duel.
1742068.name: Araphel

1743544.effect: If you control at least 2 monsters: For the rest of this Phase, your opponent cannot activate the effects of monsters with the same Attribute as the monsters you currently control. You can only activate 1 "Absolutely Dazzling!" per turn.
1743544.name: Absolutely Dazzling!

1742112.effect: When a monster declares an attack: You can target 1 monster on the field, except the attacking monster; that target becomes the new attack target. If you attack your own monster this way, any battle damage you would take is halved. You can only activate 1 "Show No Fear" per turn.
1742112.name: Show No Fear

1738022.effect: You can only control 1 "Watching Life Go By". If this card is activated: You can add 1 Level 3 or lower Dragon monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, discard 1 card. You cannot Special Summon Level 4 or higher monsters the turn you activate this effect. While you control 3 or more Dragon monsters, all monsters you control gain 300 ATK/DEF.
1738022.name: Watching Life Go By

1741062.effect: If you control a "Dream Mirror" Field Spell: Activate this card by targeting 1 monster in either GY; Special Summon it to its owner's field and equip it with this card. If the equipped monster is a "Dream Mirror" monster, it can activate its effect that activates by Tributing itself during any Phase, not just during the Main or Battle Phase. Otherwise, the equipped monster's effects are negated, and it cannot attack or be used as material for a Fusion, Synchro, Xyz or Link Summon. You can only activate 1 "Dream Mirror Parasomnia" per turn.
1741062.name: Dream Mirror Parasomnia

1741129.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Araphel". You must also banish monsters from your hand whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. While this card is in your GY, the activation and effects of "Araphel(s)" you control cannot be negated. If an "Araphel" you control would leave the field because of your opponent's card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead.
1741129.name: Creation Manifesto

1739522.effect: You can target any number of face-up cards your opponent controls, up to the number of face-up cards you control; until the end of this turn, destroy any target that activates an effect as Chain Link 3 or higher. This card must be face-up on the field to apply this effect. You can only use this effect of "Starboard Starstrike" once per turn.
1739522.name: Starboard Starstrike

1738061.effect: When you activate a card or effect as Chain Link 3 or higher: Banish 1 Yokai monster from your GY; negate the activation of the card with the lowest Chain Link number, then, if that card is on the field, destroy it. You can only activate 1 "Here We Go! To Future Endeavors!" per turn.
1738061.name: Here We Go! To Future Endeavors!
1738061.treated_as: Here We Go! To Future Endeavors!

1887992.effect: If 3 or more monster effects have been activated this turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then you can draw 1 card for every 3 monster effects your opponent has activated this turn. If the turn count is 5 or lower, neither player takes damage, also, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If the turn count is 6 or higher, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field; destroy it. You can only Special Summon "Chronoruler of Vice(s)" once per turn.
1887992.name: Chronoruler of Vice

1887990.effect: If 3 or more Spell Cards or effects have been activated this turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then you can banish 1 card from the top of your Deck for every 3 Spell Cards or effects your opponent has activated this turn. If the turn count is 5 or lower, neither player takes damage, also, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If the turn count is 6 or higher, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it if it is a Spell (if that card is Set, reveal it). You can only Special Summon "Chronoruler of Law(s)" once per turn.
1887990.name: Chronoruler of Law

1887987.effect: If 3 or more Trap Cards or effects have been activated this turn (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your hand or GY; Special Summon this card from your hand in Defense Position, then you can banish 1 card from either GY for every 3 Trap Cards or effects your opponent has activated this turn. If the turn count is 5 or lower, neither player takes damage, also, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If the turn count is 6 or higher, your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. Once per turn: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it if it is a Trap (if that card is Set, reveal it). You can only Special Summon "Chronoruler of Prosperity(s)" once per turn.
1887987.name: Chronoruler of Prosperity

1887986.effect:
All "Chronoruler" monster(s) on the field gain 100 ATK/DEF for each banished Spell. Monsters your opponent controls lose 100 ATK/DEF for each banished Trap. Once per turn if this card would leave the field by an opponent's card effect, you can shuffle 2 of your banished cards (1 Spell and 1 Trap) into the Deck instead. Once per turn, if a monster(s) is Normal or Special Summoned: You can apply this effect, depending on whose turn it is.
●Your turn: Banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell from your Deck.
●Opponent's turn: Banish 1 "Chronoruler" Trap from your Deck.
1887986.name: Chronoruler Mobius Plane

1887984.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 11 monster from your hand, then, during the End Phase of this turn, banish 1 "Chronoruler" Spell/Trap from your Deck. If you control a "Chronoruler" monster: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; neither player can declare an attack until the end of the next turn, also if the turn count is 6 or higher, you can draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Chronoruler's Commandment" effect per turn, and only once that turn. If this card would be sent from the field to the GY, banish this card instead.
1887984.name: Chronoruler's Commandment

1887983.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 11 monster from your hand, then during the End Phase of this turn, banish 1 Spell/Trap from your hand. If you control a "Chronoruler" monster: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; add 1 of your banished "Chronoruler" cards to your hand, and if you do, if the turn count is 6 or higher, you can have both players draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Chronoruler's Graciousness" effect per turn, and only once that turn. If this card would be sent from the field to the GY, banish this card instead.
1887983.name: Chronoruler's Graciousness

1887980.effect: Special Summon 1 Level 11 monster from your hand, then, during the End Phase of this turn, banish 1 Spell/Trap from your GY. If you control a "Chronoruler" monster: You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; banish 1 card from each GY, also if the turn count is 6 or higher, you can draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Chronoruler's Authority" effect per turn, and only once that turn. If this card would be sent from the field to the GY, banish this card instead.
1887980.name: Chronoruler's Authority

1887977.effect: During your opponent's turn: Special Summon 1 of your banished "Chronoruler" monsters, and if you do, if the turn count is 5 or lower, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field. During your turn, if you control no monsters, OR if all monsters you control are "Chronoruler" monster (min.1): You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; take 1 "Chronoruler" monster from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or banish it. You can only use each effect of "Chronoruler's Anger" once per turn.
1887977.name: Chronoruler's Anger

1887975.effect: During your opponent's turn: Special Summon 1 "Chronoruler" monster from your GY, and if you do, if the turn count is 5 or lower, you can destroy 1 Set card on the field. During your turn, if you control no monsters, OR if all monsters you control are "Chronoruler" monster (min.1): You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; take 1 "Chronoruler" Spell from your Deck, and either add it to your hand or banish it. You can only use each effect of "Chronoruler's Vindication" once per turn.
1887975.name: Chronoruler's Vindication

1887970.effect: During your opponent's turn: Special Summon 1 "Chronoruler" monster from your hand, and if you do, if the turn count is 5 or lower, you can destroy 1 face-up card on the field. During your turn, if you control no monsters, OR if all monsters you control are "Chronoruler" monster (min.1): You can shuffle this banished card into the Deck; take 1 "Chronoruler" Trap from your Deck to your hand, except "Chronoruler's Suppression", and either add it to your hand or banish it. You can only use each effect of "Chronoruler's Suppression" once per turn.
1887970.name: Chronoruler's Suppression
